title: Can a cancelled Viber call still be seen by the recipient? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes ! It doesn't matter what action you take afterwards whether call cancelling or whatever ,since it uses sip technology your call is already reached at user's platform as soon as you dialed any no.
Any call is seen as a missed call if the signal of the call was received by the network a device is connected to. If call is disconnected prior to this no call attempt is recorded.
